metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42890 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability in Batik of Apache XML Graphics allows an attacker to run Java code from untrusted SVG via JavaScript. This issue affects Apache XML Graphics prior to 1.16. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.16.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-42890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbatik-java - 1.8-3ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: batik package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8-3ubuntu1+esm1').
